titles.title: Milk Nutrition and Labeling Act
To amend the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act with respect to the labeling of milk.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

bill.summary: 1/21/1993--Introduced. Milk Nutrition and Labeling Act - Amends the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act to: (1) allow milk labels to indicate the non-fat content and the protein content; and (2) require, for specified forms of milk in final package for beverage use, minimum percentages of milk solids not fat.
